channel.title: Client disconnects and closes if you double click..help?
channel.description: Still have a problem with my client. I have windows 7 and whenever i double click while using my client(317 delta base), the client closes and disconnects. I was told i needed to download java 32bit, and i did, but it didnt help. I'm not sure what to do, so please help me if you can. thanks

item.source: Client disconnects and closes if you double click..help?

item.title: Client disconnects and closes if you double click..help?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

  1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.

tadah
credits to locksmin

Read full topic

item.title: Client disconnects and closes if you double click..help?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

search in client hacking and you might find a window 7 converter
itll convert the run.bat of an client to run.exe and itll wont close on you on random times
